sections.1_story: Imagine a group of friends painting a wall together. Some work faster, some slower. Time & Work helps us calculate how long it takes to finish a job when people work together or alone.

ğŸ’¡ Time: The duration taken to complete the work.
ğŸ’¡ Efficiency: Amount of work done in a unit of time.
ğŸ’¡ Work Rate: Work done per unit time (e.g., 1/5 means 1 job in 5 days).
ğŸ’¡ Combined Work: When two or more work together, their rates add up.
ğŸ’¡ Inverse Proportion: More workers, less time; fewer workers, more time.

ğŸ’¡ Alternate Work: Workers working on alternate days.
ğŸ’¡ Pipes & Cisterns: Special case where pipes fill or empty tanks.

3_formula_bank: ğŸ§® If A does a work in n days, 1 day's work = 1/n

ğŸ§® If A is x times as good as B: Ratio of work = x:1
ğŸ§® If A does work in n days, B in m days: Ratio of efficiency = m:n
ğŸ§® If A does 1/x work/day, B does 1/y work/day, together = 1/x + 1/y

4_micro_examples: A does a job in 5 days. 1 day's work = 1/5
A and B do a job in 6 and 8 days. Together: 1/6 + 1/8 = 7/24 per day
If A is twice as good as B, ratio = 2:1
If A does in 10 days, B in 15 days, efficiency = 15:10 = 3:2
Pipe fills in 4 hrs, leak empties in 8 hrs. Net = 1/4 - 1/8 = 1/8 per hr
If 12 men finish in 10 days, 8 men = (12Ã—10)/8 = 15 days
If A works 2 days, B 1 day alternately, sum their 3-day work and repeat
If total work = 24 units, A = 4/day, B = 2/day, together = 6/day, time = 4 days
If 3 workers do 1/4, 1/6, 1/8 per day, total = 13/24 per day

5_exam_examples.question: A can do a work in 12 days, B in 16 days. How long together?
A is twice as efficient as B. A finishes in 10 days. How long for both together?
A and B can do a work in 8 days, B alone in 12 days. How long for A alone?
A, B, C can do a work in 10, 15, 30 days. How long together?
A fills a tank in 6 hrs, B empties in 8 hrs. How long to fill?
12 men finish a job in 15 days. How many days for 9 men?
A and B alternate days. A does in 4, B in 6 days. How long together?
If A is 50% more efficient than B, A in 12 days. How long for both?
If 3 men or 5 women do a job in 12 days, how long for 2 men and 4 women?
If a pipe fills in 5 hrs, leak empties in 10 hrs, how long to fill?
